verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3571"\w* woman \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H4872"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cushite|strong="H3571"\w* woman.

\w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w was|strong="H4872"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w meek|strong="H6035"\w*, \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w which|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H3068"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w ye|strong="H3318"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w meeting|strong="H4150"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pillar|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Tent, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* among \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w myself|strong="H3045"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vision|strong="H4759"\w*, \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* faithful \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H4872"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5650"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w even|strong="H3808"\w* manifestly, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w dark|strong="H2420"\w* \w speeches|strong="H2420"\w*; \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w form|strong="H8544"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w behold|strong="H5027"\w*: \w wherefore|strong="H4069"\w* \w then|strong="H1696"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w ye|strong="H1696"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w them|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Tent; \w and|strong="H6437"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w was|strong="H6051"\w* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w*, \w as|strong="H6051"\w* \add white as \add*\w snow|strong="H7950"\w*: \w and|strong="H6437"\w* Aaron \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*, \w and|strong="H6437"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H6051"\w* \w leprous|strong="H6879"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron said unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Oh|strong="H4994"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord, \w lay|strong="H7896"\w* not, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*, \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4872"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H2403"\w* \w done|strong="H2398"\w* \w foolishly|strong="H2973"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4872"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H2403"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w*, \w I|strong="H7358"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w*, \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H1961"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w of|strong="H3318"\w* whom \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w is|strong="H1320"\w* \w half|strong="H2677"\w* consumed \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H3318"\w* \w cometh|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3318"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w mother|strong="H7358"\w*â€™s \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, saying, \w Heal|strong="H7495"\w* her, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, If \w her|strong="H5462"\w* father \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w spit|strong="H3417"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*? \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w her|strong="H5462"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H6440"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w brought|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H5462"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* \w brought|strong="H5265"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* again.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* afterward \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w journeyed|strong="H5265"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w Hazeroth|strong="H2698"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* \w in|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w Paran|strong="H6290"\w*.
